channel.title: Run.bat errorss
channel.description:
Im using Matrix Source. I run the source and i get this errorr:::::
[code]Launching Illumina... [Launcher] Initing Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/alex/store/Store at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:62) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.alex.store.Store at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 2 more Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
here my run.bat::
[code]@echo off title Matrix "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause[/code]

item.title: Run.bat errorss
item.dc:creator: @Morgan_Linder Morgan Linder
item.description:
@Morgan_Linder wrote:

Im using Matrix Source. I run the source and i get this errorr:::::

Launching Illumina... [Launcher] Initing Cache... Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: com/alex/store/Store at com.rs.cache.Cache.init(Cache.java:20) at com.rs.Launcher.main(Launcher.java:62) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: com.alex.store.Store at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 2 more Press any key to continue . . .

here my run.bat::

@echo off title Matrix "C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx512m -cp bin;lib/*; com.rs.Launcher true true false pause

Read full topic
